data.name: Find energy improvements suitable for your home
data.value: Darganfod gwelliannau ynni sy’n addas ar gyfer eich cartref

data.name: Get advice on which home improvements could be installed by you or a tradesperson to improve the energy efficiency of your home.
data.value: Cael cyngor ar ba welliannau i’r cartref y gallech chi neu grefftwr eu gwneud i wella effeithlonrwydd ynni eich cartref.

data.name: Who can use this service
data.value: Pwy all ddefnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn

data.name: This service is for people who own their own property in England and Wales.
data.value: Gwasanaeth yw hwn ar gyfer pobl sy’n berchen ar eu heiddo eu hunain yng Nghymru a Lloegr.

data.name: What you get from this service
data.value: Beth rydych chi’n ei gael o’r gwasanaeth hwn

data.name: This service recommends the improvements most likely to be suitable for you based on information about your home and energy use. For example, you may receive advice on:
data.value: Mae’r gwasanaeth hwn yn argymell y gwelliannau sydd fwyaf tebygol o fod yn addas i chi ar sail gwybodaeth am eich cartref a’ch defnydd o ynni. Er enghraifft, efallai y cewch gyngor ar y canlynol:

data.name: insulating your loft, walls and floor
data.value: inswleiddio eich atig, waliau a lloriau

data.name: upgrading your heating
data.value: uwchraddio eich system wresogi

data.name: fitting double glazing
data.value: gosod ffenestri gwydr dwbl

data.name: installing solar panels
data.value: gosod paneli solar

data.name: Each recommendation will explain what’s involved, how much it could cost you and how much it could save on typical energy bills. You will also receive information about where to go to for more advice.
data.value: Bydd pob argymhelliad yn egluro beth mae’n ei gynnwys, faint y gallai ei gostio i chi a faint y gallai ei arbed ar filiau ynni arferol. Byddwch hefyd yn cael gwybodaeth am ble i fynd i gael rhagor o gyngor.

data.name: You can then build an action plan of the recommendations you would like to act on. There will be advice on where to find accredited tradespeople to do the work, and information on where to go for further support.
data.value: Yna gallwch lunio cynllun gweithredu o’r argymhellion yr hoffech weithredu arnynt. Bydd cyngor am ble i ddod o hyd i grefftwyr achrededig i wneud y gwaith, a gwybodaeth am ble i fynd i gael rhagor o gymorth.

data.name: What you will need
data.value: Beth fydd ei angen arnoch

data.name: You will need to answer some questions about your home and how much energy you use.
data.value: Bydd angen i chi ateb ychydig o gwestiynau am eich cartref a faint o ynni rydych chi’n ei ddefnyddio.

data.name: There is guidance available to help you answer the questions. If you’re still unsure, take your best guess. The service can still give you useful information.
data.value: Mae canllawiau ar gael i’ch helpu i ateb y cwestiynau. Os ydych chi’n dal yn ansicr, rhowch eich dyfaliad gorau. Gall y gwasanaeth barhau i roi gwybodaeth ddefnyddiol i chi.

data.name: How long it takes
data.value: Pa mor hir mae’n ei gymryd

data.name: Start now
data.value: Dechrau nawr

data.name: Other ways to get support
data.value: Ffyrdd eraill o gael cymorth

data.name: If you would like some help with the website, you can call us to talk to one of our digital support assistants.
data.value: Os hoffech chi gael cymorth â’r wefan, gallwch ein ffonio i siarad ag un o’n cynorthwywyr cymorth digidol.

data.name: Telephone
data.value: Ffôn

data.name: Monday to Friday: 8am to 8pm
data.value: Dydd Llun i ddydd Gwener: 8am tan 8pm

data.name: Saturday and Sunday: 9am to 5pm
data.value: Dydd Sadwrn a dydd Sul: 9am tan 5pm

data.name: Find out more about call charges
data.value: Rhagor o wybodaeth am gostau galwadau

data.name: Back
data.value: Yn ôl

data.name: Skip to main content
data.value: Neidio i'r prif gynnwys

data.value: Ydych chi wedi defnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn o'r blaen?

data.value: Eich cyfeirnod 8 nod

data.value: Bwrw ymlaen

data.value: Beth mae hyn yn ei olygu?

data.name: If you have visited the service before, you can get your recommendations with the 8-character reference code provided to you during your last visit.
data.value: Os ydych chi wedi ymweld â’r gwasanaeth o’r blaen, gallwch gael gafael ar eich argymhellion gyda’r cyfeirnod 8 nod a roddwyd i chi yn ystod eich ymweliad diwethaf.

data.name: do not feel confident using a computer or mobile device
data.value: nad ydych chi’n teimlo’n hyderus wrth ddefnyddio cyfrifiadur neu ddyfais symudol

data.name: do not have internet access
data.value: nad oes gennych chi fynediad i’r rhyngrwyd

data.value: I gael cyngor cyffredinol ar effeithlonrwydd ynni ac i ddod o hyd i ffyrdd o leihau eich bil ynni, ewch i wefan yr Ymddiriedolaeth Arbed Ynni

data.name: Do you own your property?
data.value: Ydych chi'n berchen ar eich eiddo?

data.name: This service only provides advice to people who own their home.
data.value: Dim ond i bobl sy’n berchen ar eu cartrefi y mae’r gwasanaeth hwn yn rhoi cyngor.

data.name: Yes, I own my property and live in it
data.value: Ydw, rwy’n berchen ar fy eiddo ac yn byw ynddo

data.name: No, I am a tenant
data.value: Na, rwy’n denant

data.name: I am the property owner but lease my property to one or more tenants
data.value: Fi ydy perchennog yr eiddo ond rwy’n prydlesu’r eiddo i un neu fwy o denantiaid

data.name: You may be able to get help from your Energy Performance Certificate (EPC)
data.value: Efallai y gallwch gael help gan o’ch Tystysgrif Perfformiad Ynni (EPC)

data.name: An Energy Performance Certificate contains information about a property and how energy efficient it was when the certificate was made.
data.value: Mae Tystysgrif Perfformiad Ynni yn cynnwys gwybodaeth am eiddo a’i effeithlonrwydd ynni adeg dyfarnu’r dystysgrif.

data.name: We will use the information on your certificate to help you to answer our questions.
data.value: Byddwn yn defnyddio’r wybodaeth ar eich tystysgrif i’ch helpu i ateb ein cwestiynau.

data.name: The information from the certificate can be used as a guide. You may select your preferred response to any question.
data.value: Gellir defnyddio’r wybodaeth ar y dystysgrif fel canllaw. Gallwch ddewis yr ateb sydd orau gennych i unrhyw gwestiwn.

data.name: You will need to provide your property’s address to find out if has a current certificate.
data.value: Bydd angen i chi roi cyfeiriad eich eiddo i gael gwybod a oes ganddo dystysgrif gyfredol.

data.name: Would you like to see if your property has a registered Energy Performance Certificate?
data.value: Ydych chi eisiau gweld a oes gan eich eiddo Dystysgrif Perfformiad Ynni gofrestredig?

data.name: If your property does not have an Energy Performance Certificate, please choose ‘No’.
data.value: Os nad oes gan eich eiddo Dystysgrif Perfformiad Ynni, dewiswch ‘Nac oes’.

data.name: Yes
data.value: Oes

data.name: No
data.value: Nac oes

data.name: Find your EPC
data.value: Dod o hyd i’ch Tystysgrif Perfformiad Ynni

data.name: What is the address of your property?
data.value: Beth yw cyfeiriad eich eiddo?

data.name: What we do with your address
data.value: Beth rydym yn ei wneud gyda’ch cyfeiriad

data.name: Building number or name
data.value: Rhif neu enw'r adeilad

data.name: e.g. 19 or Buckingham Palace
data.value: e.e. 19 neu Palas Buckingham

data.name: Postcode
data.value: Cod post

data.name: e.g. AB12 3CD
data.value: e.e. AB12 3CD

data.name: Cancel and continue without an EPC
data.value: Canslo a bwrw ymlaen heb EPC

data.name: We weren't able to find a complete Energy Performance Certificate for your property
data.value: Doedd dim modd i ni ddod o hyd i Dystysgrif Perfformiad Ynni gyflawn ar gyfer eich eiddo

data.name: This could be because there isn't a complete Energy Performance Certificate for your property, your property is a new build or because your address is saved in a different format.
data.value: Gallai hyn fod oherwydd nad oes Tystysgrif Perfformiad Ynni gyflawn ar gyfer eich eiddo, am fod eich eiddo yn adeilad newydd, neu am fod eich cyfeiriad wedi’i gadw mewn fformat gwahanol.

data.name: You can continue without the Energy Performance Certificate. We will need to ask you some questions to work out which home improvements are most likely to be suitable for your home. There will be guidance to support you along the way.
data.value: Gallwch fwrw ymlaen heb y Dystysgrif Perfformiad Ynni. Bydd angen i ni ofyn ychydig o gwestiynau i chi er mwyn gweld pa welliannau sydd fwyaf tebygol o fod yn addas ar gyfer eich cartref. Bydd arweiniad i’ch helpu ar hyd y daith.

data.name: We found an Energy Performance Certificate that might be yours
data.value: Rydym wedi dod o hyd i Dystysgrif Perfformiad Ynni a allai fod yn eich un chi

data.name: This certificate may be registered to your property or one of the properties nearby that shares part of your address.
data.value: Efallai bod y dystysgrif hon wedi'i chofrestru i’ch eiddo neu eiddo cyfagos sy'n rhannu rhan o'ch cyfeiriad.

data.name: Certificate
data.value: Tystysgrif

data.name: Registered address
data.value: Cyfeiriad cofrestredig

data.name: Is this your address?
data.value: Ai eich cyfeiriad chi yw hwn?

data.name: YesThisIsMyAddressString
data.value: Ie

data.name: We found multiple Energy Performance Certificates that might be yours
data.value: Rydym wedi dod o hyd i fwy nag un Dystysgrif Perfformiad Ynni a allai fod yn eich un chi

data.name: One of these certificates may be registered to your property or to the properties nearby that share part of your address.
data.value: Efallai bod un o’r tystysgrifau hyn wedi'i chofrestru i’ch eiddo neu eiddo cyfagos sy'n rhannu rhan o'ch cyfeiriad.

data.name: Your address may not be listed here if it does not have a registered certificate.
data.value: Efallai na fydd eich cyfeiriad wedi’i restru yma os nad oes ganddo dystysgrif gofrestredig.

data.name: Choose your address
data.value: Dewiswch eich cyfeiriad

data.name: Please choose your address if it is listed, otherwise choose ‘My address is not listed here’
data.value: Dewiswch eich cyfeiriad os yw wedi’i restru, neu dewiswch ‘Nid yw fy nghyfeiriad wedi’i restru yma’

data.name: You can still continue to use this service as there are further questions that can help determine the kind of measures you can take.
data.value: Gallwch barhau i ddefnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn gan fod rhagor o gwestiynau a all helpu i bennu’r math o gamau y gallwch chi eu cymryd.

data.name: Confirm your EPC details
data.value: Cadarnhau manylion eich Tystysgrif Perfformiad Ynni

data.name: Check your property's details
data.value: Gwirio manylion eich eiddo

data.name: Please confirm that this information about your property is correct. This information cannot be changed later once you continue.
data.value: Cadarnhewch fod yr wybodaeth am eich eiddo yn gywir. Ni fydd modd newid yr wybodaeth hon ar ôl i chi fwrw ymlaen.

data.name: Is this information correct?
data.value: Ydy’r wybodaeth hon yn gywir?

data.name: YesThisInformationIsCorrectString
data.value: Ydy

data.value: Pa fath o eiddo sydd gennych chi?

data.name: Energy use varies between different buildings, particularly for heating.
data.value: Mae defnydd ynni yn amrywio rhwng gwahanol adeiladau, yn enwedig o ran gwresogi.

data.name: Some home improvements are only possible or appropriate for certain buildings.
data.value: Dim ond ar gyfer rhai adeiladau y mae rhai gwelliannau i’r cartref yn bosibl neu’n briodol.

data.value: Pa fath o dŷ sydd gennych chi?

data.value: Nid yw’n rhannu unrhyw un o’i waliau â thŷ neu adeilad arall

data.value: Tŷ pâr

data.value: Mae’n sownd yn un tŷ neu adeilad arall

data.value: Mae’n eistedd yn y canol gyda thŷ neu adeilad o boptu

data.value: Mae’n eistedd ar ben rhes o dai tebyg gydag un tŷ yn sownd ynddo

data.value: Pa fath o fyngalo sydd gennych chi?

data.value: Pa fath o fflat sydd gennych chi?

data.value: Mae’n eistedd yn union o dan y to heb fflat arall uwch ei ben

data.name: The lowest flat in the building with no flat beneath - typically at street level but may be a basement
data.value: Y fflat isaf yn yr adeilad heb fflat oddi tanodd - fel arfer ar lefel y stryd ond gallai fod yn fflat islawr

data.name: Roughly what year was your property built?
data.value: Oddeutu pa flwyddyn y cafodd eich eiddo ei adeiladu?

data.name: If you are unsure, choose 'I don't know'. We will take a best guess based on other information you provide.
data.value: Os nad ydych chi’n siŵr, dewiswch ‘Ddim yn gwybod’. Byddwn yn gwneud y dyfaliad gorau ar sail yr wybodaeth arall rydych chi’n ei rhoi.

data.name: Help me answer this question
data.value: Helpwch fi i ateb y cwestiwn hwn

data.name: You may find information about the age of the property in title deeds or other paperwork you received when you bought your home, or home insurance paperwork.
data.value: Efallai y byddwch yn gallu dod o hyd i wybodaeth am oed yr eiddo mewn gweithredoedd neu waith papur arall a gawsoch wrth brynu eich cartref, neu yng ngwaith papur eich yswiriant cartref.

data.name: If your property is a conversion, enter the year the building was originally built, regardless of what the building was used for before it was your home.
data.value: Os yw eich eiddo'n addasiad, nodwch y flwyddyn y cafodd yr adeilad ei godi'n wreiddiol, ni waeth ar gyfer beth y defnyddiwyd yr adeilad cyn iddo fod yn gartref i chi.

data.name: If your property has been extended, enter the year of the oldest part of the building.
data.value: Os yw eich eiddo wedi cael ei ymestyn, nodwch flwyddyn rhan hynaf yr adeilad.

data.name: What kind of walls does your property have?
data.value: Pa fath o waliau sydd gan eich eiddo?

data.name: Solid walls may be made from brick or stone. If your home was built before 1930, it’s likely to have solid walls.
data.value: Gall waliau solet fod o frics neu gerrig. Os cafodd eich cartref ei adeiladu cyn 1930, mae’n debygol mai waliau solet sydd ganddo.

data.name: Most homes built after 1930 have cavity walls. Cavity walls have a gap, or cavity, between the wall outside and wall inside.
data.value: Waliau ceudod sydd yn y rhan fwyaf o gartrefi a adeiladwyd ar ôl 1930. Mae gan waliau ceudod fwlch, neu geudod, rhwng y wal allanol a’r wal fewnol.

data.name: You may have both types. For example, you have a pre-1930 home with an extension built later than 1930.
data.value: Efallai bod gennych chi’r ddau fath. Er enghraifft, mae gennych chi gartref cyn-1930 gydag estyniad a gafodd ei adeiladu ar ôl 1930.

data.name: Help me choose which wall type I have
data.value: Helpwch fi i ddewis pa fath o wal sydd gen i

data.name: Solid brick walls will have an alternating pattern, with some bricks laid across the wall so you can see the smaller ends from the outside.
data.value: Bydd gan waliau brics solet batrwm bob yn ail, gyda rhai brics wedi’u gosod ar draws y wal fel eich bod yn gallu gweld y pennau llai o’r tu allan.

data.name: If your home has cavity walls, the bricks typically have an even pattern with all bricks laid lengthways.
data.value: Os oes gan eich cartref waliau ceudod, fel arfer bydd gan y brics batrwm cyfartal gyda phob un o’r brics wedi’u gosod ar eu hyd.

data.name: If the brickwork has been covered, you may be able to tell by measuring the width of the wall. Measure the depth of the wall by a window or door on one of your external walls.
data.value: Os yw’r gwaith brics wedi’i orchuddio, efallai y byddwch yn gallu dweud drwy fesur lled y wal. Mesurwch ddyfnder y wal ger ffenestr neu ddrws ar un o’ch waliau allanol.

data.name: If a brick wall is more than 260mm thick, then it is probably a cavity wall.
data.value: Os yw trwch y wal frics yn fwy na 260mm, yna mae’n debyg mai wal geudod ydyw.

data.name: A narrower wall is probably a solid wall. Stone walls may be thicker still but are usually solid.
data.value: Mae’n debyg bod wal gulach yn un solet. Gall waliau cerrig fod yn fwy trwchus na hynny ond fel arfer maent yn solet.

data.name: Solid walls
data.value: Waliau solet

data.name: Cavity walls
data.value: Waliau ceudod

data.name: Mix of solid and cavity walls
data.value: Cymysgedd o waliau solet a waliau ceudod

data.name: I don’t see my option listed
data.value: Dydw i ddim yn gweld fy opsiwn ar y rhestr

data.name: Other wall types could include cob walls, timber framed, system built, steel framed or other non-traditional build types
data.value: Gallai mathau eraill o waliau gynnwys waliau clom, ffrâm bren, system barod, ffrâm ddur neu fathau eraill anhraddodiadol

data.name: Are your solid walls insulated?
data.value: Ydy eich waliau solet wedi’u hinsiwleiddio?

data.name: Solid wall insulation may be installed internally, inside your home, or externally, on the outside walls.
data.value: Mae modd gosod deunydd inswleiddio waliau solet yn fewnol, y tu mewn i’ch cartref, neu’n allanol, ar y waliau allanol.

data.name: Solid walls are more common in pre-1930 buildings and these were typically built without insulation.
data.value: Mae waliau solet yn fwy cyffredin mewn adeiladau cyn-1930 ac roedd y rhain fel arfer yn cael eu hadeiladu heb ddeunydd inswleiddio.

data.name: If you have solid walls, it’s unlikely they are insulated.
data.value: Os oes gennych chi waliau solet, mae’n annhebygol eu bod wedi’u hinswleiddio.

data.name: Yes, they are all insulated
data.value: Ydy, maen nhw i gyd wedi’u hinswleiddio

data.name: Some are insulated and some are not
data.value: Mae rhai ohonynt wedi’u hinswleiddio a dydy rhai ddim

data.name: No, they are not insulated
data.value: Na, dydyn nhw ddim wedi’u hinswleiddio

data.name: Are your cavity walls insulated?
data.value: Ydy eich waliau ceudod wedi’u hinswleiddio?

data.name: Cavity walls built before 1991 are typically uninsulated, unless you or someone before you had insulation installed.
data.value: Fel arfer dydy waliau ceudod a adeiladwyd cyn 1991 ddim wedi’u hinswleiddio, oni bai eich bod chi, neu rywun cyn chi, wedi’u hinswleiddio.

data.name: Cavity walls built after 1991 were typically built with insulating material between the outer and inner walls.
data.value: Roedd waliau ceudod a adeiladwyd ar ôl 1991 fel arfer yn cynnwys deunydd inswleiddio rhwng y waliau mewnol ac allanol.

data.name: Many cavity walls can be insulated by injecting insulation material into the cavity from the outside. A specialist company will drill holes in the outside walls, inject insulation through the holes and then seal them with cement.
data.value: Mae modd inswleiddio llawer o waliau ceudod drwy chwistrellu deunydd inswleiddio i mewn i’r ceudod o’r tu allan. Bydd cwmni arbenigol yn drilio tyllau yn y waliau allanol, yn chwistrellu deunydd inswleiddio drwy’r tyllau ac yna’n eu selio â sment.

data.name: If there are small, filled 22 millimetre holes at regular intervals around the outside walls, it’s a sign they may have been insulated.
data.value: Os oes tyllau bach 22 milimetr wedi’u llenwi i’w gweld bob hyn a hyn yn y waliau allanol, mae’n arwydd eu bod o bosibl wedi cael eu hinswleiddio.

data.name: How is your ground floor built?
data.value: Sut adeiladwyd eich llawr gwaelod?

data.name: Many homes have a ground floor made of solid concrete.
data.value: Gyda choncrid solet yr adeiladwyd llawr gwaelod llawer o gartrefi.

data.name: Older homes are more likely to have suspended timber floors. If you have air bricks or ventilation bricks on the outside wall of your house that are below floor level, you probably have a suspended timber floor.
data.value: Mae cartrefi hŷn yn fwy tebygol o gael lloriau pren crog. Os oes gennych chi frics aer neu frics awyru ar wal allanol eich tŷ sy’n is na lefel y llawr, mae’n debygol mai llawr pren crog sydd gennych.

data.name: You may have both types, for example, if there’s a modern extension to a pre-1950 property.
data.value: Efallai fod gennych y ddau fath, er enghraifft, os oes estyniad modern ar eiddo cyn-1950.

data.name: If you don’t have access to the space underneath your house, you will need to lift a corner of the carpet and underlay to have a look.
data.value: Os nad oes modd mynd i’r gofod o dan eich tŷ, bydd angen i chi godi cornel o’r carped a’r isgarped i gael golwg.

data.name: Other ground floor construction types include suspended concrete, flagstones or non-traditional build types.
data.value: Mae mathau eraill o loriau gwaelod yn cynnwys concrid crog, cerrig llorio neu fathau anhraddodiadol.

data.name: Is your ground floor insulated?
data.value: Ydy eich llawr gwaelod wedi'i inswleiddio?

data.name: Properties built before 1996 typically have uninsulated floors, unless you or a previous owner has installed floor insulation.
data.value: Fel arfer dydy lloriau mewn eiddo a adeiladwyd cyn 1996 ddim wedi’u hinswleiddio, oni bai eich bod chi neu berchennog blaenorol wedi ychwanegu deunydd inswleiddio.

data.name: A solid floor may be insulated by laying insulation on top or underneath a new floor. If you’ve had to replace the ground floor, it’s likely insulated in order to comply with Building Regulations.
data.value: Mae modd inswleiddio llawr solet drwy osod deunydd inswleiddio ar ben neu o dan lawr newydd. Os oedd yn rhaid i chi adnewyddu’r llawr gwaelod, mae’n debygol ei fod wedi’i inswleiddio i gydymffurfio â’r Rheoliadau Adeiladu.

data.name: Suspended timber floors were rarely built with insulation, so this would need to have been installed after.
data.value: Anaml iawn y byddai lloriau pren crog yn cael eu hinswleiddio, felly byddai angen iddo fod wedi’i osod ar ôl hynny.

data.name: Is any part of your roof flat?
data.value: Oes unrhyw ran o’ch to yn fflat?

data.name: Most roofs are pitched, meaning they are built at an angle or with a slope.
data.value: Mae’r rhan fwyaf o doeau ar oleddf, sy’n golygu eu bod wedi’u hadeiladu ar ongl neu ar lethr.

data.name: A flat roof is completely, or almost, level, with no obvious slope or angle.
data.value: Mae to fflat yn hollol wastad, neu bron yn wastad, heb lethr nac ongl amlwg.

data.name: Help me decide if I have a loft
data.value: Helpwch fi i benderfynu a oes gennyf atig

data.name: A loft is an unheated space without walls and ceilings, immediately beneath the pitched roof. You will usually be able to see the roof timbers.
data.value: Mae atig yn ofod heb ei wresogi ac nid oes ganddo waliau na nenfydau - mae’n union o dan y to ar oleddf. Byddwch fel arfer yn gallu gweld y trawstiau.

data.name: If all the space under your pitched roof, or nearly all the space, is used as living space with finished walls and ceilings then the loft has been converted into a room.
data.value: Os yw’r gofod i gyd dan eich to ar oleddf, neu'r rhan fwyaf o’r gofod hwnnw, yn cael ei ddefnyddio fel lle byw gyda waliau a nenfydau gorffenedig, yna mae’r atig wedi’i droi’n ystafell.

data.name: Is there access to your loft?
data.value: A oes modd mynd i’ch atig?

data.name: You may have a loft hatch, access ladder or stairs that could allow an insulation installer to get into the loft space.
data.value: Efallai fod gennych ddrws i’r atig, ysgol neu risiau mynediad a allai ganiatáu i'r sawl sy'n gosod y deunydd inswleiddio fynd i mewn i’r atig.

data.name: Is your loft fully insulated?
data.value: Ydy eich atig wedi'i inswleiddio yn llwyr?

data.name: If your home was built after 2002, or you have installed loft insulation since 2002, it is likely that it is fully insulated.
data.value: Os cafodd eich cartref ei adeiladu ar ôl 2002, neu os ydych chi wedi inswleiddio’r atig ers 2002, mae’n debygol ei fod wedi’i inswleiddio’n llwyr.

data.name: Your 2013 Energy Performance Certificate suggests your loft is fully insulated as it has at least 200mm of insulation.
data.value: Mae eich Tystysgrif Perfformiad Ynni 2013 yn awgrymu bod eich atig wedi’i inswleiddio’n llwyr a bod gennych o leiaf 200mm o ddeunydd inswleiddio.

data.name: Your 2013 Energy Performance Certificate suggests your loft is not fully insulated as it has less than 200mm of insulation.
data.value: Mae eich Tystysgrif Perfformiad Ynni 2013 yn awgrymu nad ydy eich atig wedi’i inswleiddio’n llwyr a bod gennych lai na 200mm o ddeunydd inswleiddio.

data.name: Are any of your windows single glazed?
data.value: A oes unrhyw un o’ch ffenestri yn rhai gwydr sengl?

data.name: A single glazed window has a single pane of glass.
data.value: Un cwarel gwydr sydd mewn ffenestr gwydr sengl.

data.name: A double glazed window has two panes of glass, separated by air or gas, to make up a single window. A triple glazed window has three panes of glass.
data.value: Mae dau gwarel gwydr mewn ffenestr gwydr dwbl, wedi'u gwahanu ag aer neu nwy, i greu un ffenestr. Mae tri cwarel gwydr mewn ffenestr gwydr triphlyg.

data.name: Secondary glazing is when an additional independent window is fitted inside, behind the main window. This is commonly used in conservation areas to improve the energy efficiency of the window without replacing it.
data.value: Gwydr eilaidd yw pan fydd ffenestr annibynnol ychwanegol yn cael ei gosod y tu mewn, y tu ôl i’r brif ffenestr. Gwneir hyn yn aml mewn ardaloedd cadwraeth i wella effeithlonrwydd ynni’r ffenestr heb ei newid.

data.name: Do you have anywhere outside your home where you could fit a heat pump?
data.value: Oes gennych chi unrhyw le y tu allan i’ch cartref lle gallech chi osod pwmp gwres?

data.name: Most heat pump systems will need some outside space that you own where you could fit an external unit, about as big as a medium-sized chest of drawers.
data.value: Bydd y rhan fwyaf o systemau pwmp gwres angen rhywfaint o le y tu allan lle gallech ffitio uned allanol sydd tua’r un maint â chist ddillad o faint canolig.

data.name: If you have a garden or own some land next to your home that would be accessible to an installer, then you may have enough outside space for a heat pump.
data.value: Os oes gennych chi ardd neu os ydych chi’n berchen ar dir wrth ymyl eich cartref a fyddai’n hygyrch i osodwr, yna efallai fod gennych chi ddigon o le y tu allan ar gyfer pwmp gwres.

data.name: If you don’t have a garden or don’t own any land next to your home, then you may not have anywhere that could fit the external unit of a heat pump.
data.value: Os nad oes gennych chi ardd neu os nad ydych chi’n berchen ar dir wrth ymyl eich cartref, efallai na fydd gennych unrhyw le i osod uned allanol y pwmp gwres.

data.name: What is a heat pump?
data.value: Beth yw pwmp gwres?

data.name: A heat pump is a heating technology transferring heat from outside to heat your rooms and hot water.
data.value: Pwmp gwres yw technoleg gwresogi sy’n trosglwyddo gwres o’r tu allan i wresogi eich ystafelloedd a’ch dŵr poeth.

data.name: The most common type in the UK are air-to-water heat pumps, meaning they transfer heat energy in the air to water that is sent to your radiators or underfloor heating, as well as a hot water cylinder for providing hot water.
data.value: Y math mwyaf cyffredin yn y DU yw pympiau gwres aer-i-ddŵr, sy’n golygu eu bod yn trosglwyddo ynni gwres yn yr aer i ddŵr sy’n cael ei anfon i’ch rheiddiaduron neu system wresogi dan y llawr, yn ogystal â thanc dŵr poeth ar gyfer darparu dŵr poeth.

data.name: Yes
data.value: Oes

data.name: No
data.value: Nac oes

data.name: I don't know
data.value: Ddim yn gwybod

data.name: What is your main heating system?
data.value: Beth yw eich prif system wresogi?

data.name: Most people in England and Wales heat their home with a gas boiler.
data.value: Mae’r rhan fwyaf o bobl yng Nghymru a Lloegr yn gwresogi eu cartrefi â boeler nwy.

data.name: People who have an oil or liquified petroleum gas (LPG) boiler will order fuel in advance.
data.value: Bydd pobl sydd â boeler olew neu nwy petrolewm hylifedig (LPG) yn archebu tanwydd ymlaen llaw.

data.name: Storage heaters convert electricity to heat and provide that heat the next day.
data.value: Mae gwresogyddion stôr yn trosi trydan yn wres ac yn darparu’r gwres hwnnw y diwrnod canlynol.

data.name: Direct acting electric heating refers to all electric radiators or plug-in heaters that use electricity at the same time as they emit heat.
data.value: Mae gwres trydan uniongyrchol yn cyfeirio at bob gwresogydd trydan neu wresogydd plygio i mewn sy’n defnyddio trydan ar yr un pryd ag y maent yn rhyddhau gwres.

data.name: A heat pump transfers heat energy from the outdoor environment inside, either through a warm-air system or through radiators or underfloor heating
data.value: Mae pwmp gwres yn trosglwyddo ynni gwres o’r amgylchedd tu allan i’r tu mewn, naill ai drwy system gwresogi aer cynnes neu drwy reiddiaduron neu system wresogi dan y llawr

data.name: If you have more than one heating type, select the system that you use more often, or that is able to heat the whole home. For example, select ‘Oil boiler’ if you have an oil boiler and wood burning stove.
data.value: Os oes gennych chi fwy nag un math o ddull gwresogi, dewiswch y system rydych chi’n ei defnyddio amlaf, neu sy’n gallu gwresogi’r cartref cyfan. Er enghraifft, dewiswch 'Bwyler olew' os oes gennych chi foeler olew a stôf llosgi coed.

data.name: Gas boiler
data.value: Boeler nwy

data.name: Oil boiler
data.value: Boeler olew

data.name: LPG boiler
data.value: Boeler LPG

data.name: You have an LPG boiler if you order gas deliveries to a tank in your garden
data.value: Mae gennych chi foeler LPG os ydych chi’n archebu nwy i danc yn eich gardd

data.name: Storage heaters
data.value: Gwresogyddion stôr

data.name: Direct acting electric heating
data.value: Gwres trydan uniongyrchol

data.name: This could include electric fires, fan heaters or electric radiators
data.value: Gallai hyn gynnwys tanau trydan, gwresogyddion ffan neu reiddiaduron trydan

data.name: Heat pump
data.value: Pwmp gwres

data.name: Other
data.value: Arall

data.name: Do you have a hot water cylinder?
data.value: Oes gennych chi danc dŵr poeth?

data.name: If you have a combi boiler, you will not have a hot water cylinder.
data.value: Os oes gennych foeler cyfun, ni fydd gennych danc dŵr poeth.

data.name: If you’re not sure what a hot water cylinder is, we’ve provided some guidance on this page that could help.
data.value: Os nad ydych chi’n siŵr beth yw tanc dŵr poeth, rydym wedi cynnwys canllawiau ar y dudalen hon a allai helpu.

data.name: Yes, I have a hot water cylinder
data.value: Oes, mae gen i danc dŵr poeth

data.name: No, I do not have a hot water cylinder
data.value: Nag oes, does gen i ddim tanc dŵr poeth

data.name: Most homes in England and Wales do not have a hot water cylinder.
data.value: Does gan y rhan fwyaf o gartrefi yng Nghymru a Lloegr ddim tanc dŵr poeth.

data.name: What is a hot water cylinder?
data.value: Beth yw tanc dŵr poeth?

data.name: A hot water cylinder, or hot water tank, stores hot water and is separate from your boiler.
data.value: Mae tanc, neu silindr, dŵr poeth yn storio dŵr poeth ac mae ar wahân i’ch boeler.

data.name: If you have a warm tank in an airing cupboard or loft space, it’s likely this is your hot water cylinder.
data.value: Os oes tanc cynnes mewn cwpwrdd crasu neu ofod atig mae'n debygol mai hwn yw eich tanc dŵr poeth.

data.name: Image above is of a typical domestic hot water cylinder. It is a large round cylinder with pipes attached at multiple places. It is separate from the boiler.
data.value: Mae’r llun uchod yn dangos tanc dŵr poeth domestig nodweddiadol. Mae’n silindr crwn mawr gyda phibellau’n sownd mewn sawl lle. Mae ar wahân i’r boeler.

data.name: Biomass boiler
data.value: Boeler biomas

data.name: A biomass boiler burns wood logs, chips or pellets and provides your whole home with heating
data.value: Mae boeler biomas yn llosgi logiau, naddion neu beledi coed ac yn cynhesu’r cartref cyfan

data.name: Coal or solid fuel heating
data.value: Gwres glo neu danwydd solet

data.name: You have coal or solid fuel heating if you burn coal or other solid fuels in a fireplace or stove
data.value: Mae gennych wres glo neu danwydd solet os ydych chi’n llosgi glo neu danwydd solet arall mewn lle tân neu stôf

data.name: How many people live in your home?
data.value: Sawl person sy’n byw yn eich cartref?

data.name: Count all adults and any children normally resident in your home.
data.value: Cyfrwch bob oedolyn ac unrhyw blant sy'n byw yn eich cartref fel arfer.

data.name: This information allows us to estimate how much energy your household uses.
data.value: Mae’r wybodaeth hon yn ein galluogi i amcangyfrif faint o ynni mae eich cartref yn ei ddefnyddio.

data.name: e.g. 3
data.value: e.e. 3

data.name: Skip this question
data.value: Anwybyddu’r cwestiwn hwn

data.name: In winter, how do you typically heat your home?
data.value: Sut ydych chi’n gwresogi eich cartref fel arfer dros y gaeaf?

data.name: We know heating use can vary throughout the year and from one day to the next.
data.value: Rydym yn gwybod bod y defnydd o wres yn gallu amrywio drwy gydol y flwyddyn ac o un diwrnod i’r llall.

data.name: Choose an answer that best resembles an average weekday in winter, or let us know a specific number of hours.
data.value: Dewiswch yr ateb sy’n cyfateb orau i ddiwrnod arferol o’r wythnos yn y gaeaf, neu nodwch nifer penodol o oriau.

data.name: You may have your heating on through the day but switch it off before you go to sleep at night.
data.value: Efallai y bydd eich gwres ymlaen yn ystod y dydd ond eich bod yn ei ddiffodd cyn mynd i gysgu gyda’r nos.

data.name: Some people may run their heating all night, or for a few hours overnight.
data.value: Efallai y bydd rhai pobl yn rhedeg eu system wresogi drwy’r nos, neu am ychydig o oriau dros nos.

data.name: I'd like to input my hours
data.value: Hoffwn nodi’r nifer o oriau

data.name: Total whole number of hours in the morning (12am until 12pm)
data.value: Cyfanswm nifer yr oriau yn y bore (12am tan 12pm)

data.name: e.g. 6
data.value: e.e. 6

data.name: Total whole number of hours in the afternoon and evening (12pm until 12am)
data.value: Cyfanswm nifer yr oriau yn y prynhawn a gyda’r nos (12pm tan 12am)

data.name: What temperature do you heat your home to?
data.value: I ba dymheredd ydych chi’n gwresogi eich cartref?

data.name: If you have a room thermostat, this will be the temperature that is usually set to.
data.value: Os oes gennych chi thermostat ystafell, hwn fydd y tymheredd a osodir ar hwnnw fel arfer.

data.name: Enter the temperature you heat your home to in degrees Celcius (°C).
data.value: Nodwch i ba dymheredd rydych chi’n gwresogi eich cartref mewn gradd Celsius (°C).

data.name: What temperature should I heat my home to?
data.value: I ba dymheredd ddylwn i wresogi fy nghartref?

data.name: The World Health Organisation recommends living areas are heated between 18 and 21 degrees Celsius (°C).
data.value: Mae Sefydliad Iechyd y Byd yn argymell bod mannau byw yn cael eu gwresogi rhwng 18 a 21 gradd Celsius (°C).

data.name: Age UK suggest the elderly heat their main living areas to 21 degrees, while heating the rest of their home to at least 18 degrees.
data.value: Mae Age UK yn awgrymu bod yr henoed yn gwresogi eu prif fannau byw i 21 gradd, ac yn gwresogi gweddill eu cartref i 18 gradd o leiaf.

data.name: Check your answers
data.value: Gwiriwch eich atebion

data.name: Please review the information we have gathered. You can still change your answers if anything looks wrong.
data.value: Ailedrychwch ar yr wybodaeth rydym wedi’i chasglu. Gallwch newid eich atebion os ydy unrhyw beth yn edrych yn anghywir.

data.name: See results
data.value: Gweler y canlyniadau

data.name: Question skipped
data.value: Wedi anwybyddu’r cwestiwn

data.name: MostCommonMethodOfHeatingIsGasBoilerString
data.value: Y dull gwresogi mwyaf cyffredin yw gyda boeler nwy.

data.name: Do you have a loft that hasn't been converted into a room?
data.value: Oes gennych chi atig sydd heb ei droi’n ystafell?

data.name: Is there access to your loft?
data.value: A oes modd mynd i’ch atig?

data.name: Is your loft fully insulated?
data.value: Ydy eich atig wedi'i inswleiddio yn llwyr?

data.name: Outdoor space for heat pump
data.value: Lle y tu allan ar gyfer pwmp gwres

data.name: Size of household
data.value: Maint yr aelwyd

data.name: Heating pattern
data.value: Patrwm gwresogi

data.name: Temperature
data.value: Tymheredd

data.name: Important
data.value: Pwysig

data.name: Your saved recommendations will be reset if you change any of your answers
data.value: Bydd eich argymhellion sydd wedi’u cadw’n cael eu hailosod os byddwch yn newid unrhyw un o’ch atebion

data.name: You may be able to make some improvements to your home
data.value: Efallai y byddwch yn gallu gwneud rhywfaint o welliannau i’ch cartref

data.name: Based on the information you’ve given us, there may be some changes a qualified installer could make to your home to reduce the amount of energy it needs to use.
data.value: Ar sail yr wybodaeth rydych chi wedi’i rhoi i ni, efallai y bydd rhai newidiadau y gallai gosodwr cymwys eu gwneud i’ch cartref i leihau faint o ynni y mae angen iddo ei ddefnyddio.

data.name: We’ve found 6 recommended improvements for you to consider.
data.value: Rydym wedi dod o hyd i 6 o welliannau i chi eu hystyried.

data.name: We will advise you if your home needs to meet certain conditions for a given improvement to be effective for you.
data.value: Byddwn yn eich cynghori os oes angen i’ch cartref fodloni rhai amodau penodol i’r gwelliant fod yn effeithiol i chi.

data.name: If you like any of these recommendations, you can save them to your action plan before you move on.
data.value: Os ydych chi’n hoffi unrhyw un o’r argymhellion hyn, gallwch eu cadw yn eich cynllun gweithredu cyn bwrw ymlaen.

data.name: CostsAndSavingsAreEstimatesWarningTextString
data.value: Amcangyfrifon yw’r costau a’r arbedion rydyn ni’n eu darparu ac efallai na fyddan nhw yr un fath yn ymarferol. Mae’r arbedion sy’n cael eu dangos wedi’u seilio ar gap prisiau ynni Ionawr 2025 ar gyfer biliau nwy a thrydan, ac ar brisiau ynni RdSAP ar gyfer pob math arall o danwydd gwresogi. Wrth i brisiau ynni newid, bydd yr amcangyfrifon o’r arbedion yn newid hefyd.

data.name: Getting back to your recommendations once you leave
data.value: Mynd yn ôl at eich argymhellion ar ôl i chi adael

data.name: You will need a reference code to return to your recommendations and action plan quickly if you leave the service.
data.value: Bydd angen cyfeirnod arnoch i fynd yn ôl at eich argymhellion a’ch cynllun gweithredu yn gyflym os ydych cyn gadael y gwasanaeth.

data.name: Your reference code
data.value: Eich cyfeirnod

data.name: Would you like us to email the above?
data.value: Hoffech chi gael e-bost â’r manylion uchod?

data.name: We will send you a link to your recommendations and your reference code so you can quickly get back when you need to. If you do not wish to provide an email, make sure you make a note of your reference code.
data.value: Byddwn yn anfon dolen i’ch argymhellion atoch ynghyd â’ch cyfeirnod fel bod modd i chi ddod yn ôl yn gyflym pan fydd angen. Os nad ydych yn dymuno rhoi e-bost, gwnewch yn siŵr eich bod yn gwneud nodyn o’ch cyfeirnod.

data.name: Yes, email a link and the reference code to me
data.value: Hoffwn, e-bostiwch ddolen a’r cyfeirnod ataf

data.name: Explore recommendations
data.value: Archwilio argymhellion

data.name: 1 recommended improvement
data.value: 1 gwelliant a argymhellir

data.name: Your home is energy efficient
data.value: Mae eich cartref yn defnyddio ynni’n effeithlon

data.name: Your home is well insulated
data.value: Mae eich cartref wedi’i inswleiddio’n dda

data.name: From the information collected, it seems like your home is already energy efficient and may not significantly benefit from further measures.
data.value: O’r wybodaeth a gasglwyd, mae’n ymddangos bod eich cartref eisoes yn defnyddio ynni’n effeithlon ac mae’n bosibl na fyddai’n elwa’n sylweddol ar ragor o fesurau.

data.name: You may be able to make changes to how you use energy to help reduce your bills.
data.value: Efallai y gallwch newid y ffordd rydych chi’n defnyddio ynni er mwyn helpu i leihau eich biliau.

data.name: What else you can do
data.value: Beth arall allwch chi ei wneud

data.name: If you’d like to do more to improve the energy efficiency of your home, consider the following:
data.value: Os hoffech chi wneud mwy i wella effeithlonrwydd ynni eich cartref, beth am ystyried y canlynol:

data.name: Install a heat pump –
data.value: Gosod pwmp gwres –

data.name: Check if your home may be suitable
data.value: Edrychwch a ydy eich cartref yn addas

data.name: When buying new appliances, upgrade to an energy efficient one -
data.value: Pan fyddwch yn prynu offer newydd, beth am uwchraddio i un sy'n defnyddio ynni'n effeithlon -

data.name: Learn about energy labels
data.value: Rhagor o wybodaeth am labeli ynni

data.name: Still need help?
data.value: Angen mwy o help?

data.name: Returning to this service
data.value: Dod yn ôl at y gwasanaeth hwn

data.name: You can come back to this page using your reference number or we can send a link to your email.
data.value: Gallwch ddod yn ôl i’r dudalen hon drwy ddefnyddio eich cyfeirnod neu gallwn anfon dolen i’ch e-bost.

data.name: Start over
data.value: Dechrau eto

data.name: See if there are improvements you can make to another property.
data.value: Gweld a oes gwelliannau y gallwch chi eu gwneud i eiddo arall.

data.name: Start again for another property
data.value: Dechrau eto ar gyfer eiddo arall

data.name: Give feedback
data.value: Rhoi adborth

data.name: This service is still in its early stages and under active development
data.value: Mae’n ddyddiau cynnar o hyd ar y gwasanaeth hwn ac mae’n dal i gael ei ddatblygu

data.name: Your feedback can help us to shape how the service develops so that it can best serve the needs of the public.
data.value: Gall eich adborth ein helpu i ddatblygu’r gwasanaeth er mwyn diwallu anghenion y cyhoedd yn y ffordd orau.

data.name: Leave some feedback for this service (opens in new tab)
data.value: Gadael adborth ar gyfer y gwasanaeth hwn (yn agor mewn tab newydd)

data.name: Download Recommendations
data.value: Llwytho Argymhellion i Lawr

data.name: You haven’t saved any improvements yet.
data.value: Dydych chi ddim wedi cadw unrhyw welliannau eto.

data.name: Your action plan
data.value: Eich cynllun gweithredu

data.name: You have saved 1 recommended improvement.
data.value: Rydych chi wedi cadw 1 gwelliant a argymhellir.

data.name: YouHaveSavedMoreThanOneImprovementString
data.value: Rydych chi wedi cadw {0} welliant a argymhellir.

data.name: You will be able to review your action plan once you have seen all the available recommendations.
data.value: Byddwch yn gallu adolygu eich cynllun gweithredu ar ôl gweld pob un o’r argymhellion sydd ar gael.

data.name: RecommendationXofYString
data.value: Argymhelliad {0} o {1}

data.name: Based on the information we have collected; it looks like you have some insulation in your loft but it’s less than the recommended amount. It could be worthwhile adding some more to bring it up to the recommended thickness of 300mm, or 12 inches.
data.value: Ar sail yr wybodaeth rydym wedi'i chasglu; mae'n ymddangos bod gennych rywfaint o ddeunydd inswleiddio yn eich atig ond ei fod yn llai na'r hyn a argymhellir. Gallai fod yn werth ychwanegu mwy i’w godi i’r trwch a argymhellir o 300mm, neu 12 modfedd.

data.name: Adding extra insulation can help trap the heat inside your property so your heating doesn’t need to be on as much.
data.value: Gall ychwanegu deunydd inswleiddio ychwanegol helpu i ddal gwres y tu mewn i’ch eiddo fel nad oes angen rhoi’ch gwres ymlaen gymaint.

data.name: If some of your loft is boarded so that you can store things up there you will either need to raise this boarding up and insulate underneath it, or leave that part of the loft with thinner insulation.
data.value: Os oes estyll mewn rhan o'ch atig er mwyn storio pethau yno, bydd angen i chi naill ai godi'r estyll hyn i fyny ac inswleiddio oddi tanodd, neu adael y rhan honno o'r atig â deunydd inswleiddio teneuach.

data.name: Who this improvement is suitable for
data.value: Ar gyfer pwy mae’r gwelliant hwn yn addas

data.name: You should consider this improvement for your property if:
data.value: Dylech ystyried y gwelliant hwn ar gyfer eich eiddo:

data.name: You have a pitched (sloping) roof with an unheated loft space that someone could easily get into.
data.value: Os oes gennych chi do ar oleddf (llethr) gydag atig heb ei wresogi y gallai rhywun fynd iddo’n ddidrafferth.

data.name: Your loft has less than the recommended amount of insulation. This is 300mm or 12 inches thick.
data.value: Os oes llai o ddeunydd inswleiddio nag yr argymhellir yn eich atig. Hynny yw, trwch o 300mm neu 12 modfedd.

data.name: What you could save
data.value: Faint allech chi ei arbed

data.name: This could save up to
data.value: Gallai hyn arbed hyd at

data.name: Which adds up to
data.value: Sy’n cyfateb i

data.name: This could cost
data.value: Gallai hyn gostio

data.name: Will this cause disruption during installation?
data.value: A fydd y gwaith gosod yn tarfu ar yr aelwyd?

data.name: How long could this take to install?
data.value: Pa mor hir allai ei gymryd i’w osod?

data.name: Would you consider this improvement for your property?
data.value: A fyddech chi’n ystyried y gwelliant hwn ar gyfer eich eiddo?

data.name: Yes, save this recommendation to my action plan
data.value: Byddwn, cadw’r argymhelliad hwn yn fy nghynllun gweithredu

data.name: Maybe, but I’d like more information
data.value: Efallai, ond hoffwn gael rhagor o wybodaeth

data.name: No, discard this recommendation
data.value: Na fyddwn, anwybyddu’r argymhelliad hwn

data.name: Continue to
data.value: Parhau i

data.name: Recommendation 2
data.value: Argymhelliad 2

data.name: Upgrade your heating controls
data.value: Uwchraddio eich rheolaethau gwresogi

data.name: If you have a central heating system then it’s important you can control it effectively, so that you can stay warm without wasting energy.
data.value: Os oes gennych chi system gwres canolog, mae’n bwysig bod modd ei rheoli’n effeithiol er mwyn i chi allu cadw’n gynnes heb wastraffu ynni.

data.name: The standard way to do that is to have a central programmer and thermostat to manage when the heating is on and how much, as well as thermostatic radiator valves (TRVs) to control the heating in each room.
data.value: Y ffordd safonol o wneud hynny yw cael rhaglennydd canolog a thermostat i reoli pryd mae’r gwres ymlaen ac am ba mor hir, yn ogystal â falfiau thermostatig rheiddiadur (TRVs) i reoli’r gwres ym mhob ystafell.

data.name: Alternatively, you may want to choose a smart heating controller to make it easier to adjust the settings.
data.value: Fel arall, efallai y byddwch yn dymuno dewis rheolydd gwres clyfar i’w gwneud yn haws addasu’r gosodiadau.

data.name: You will need a competent installer to fit new controls to your heating system.
data.value: Bydd angen gosodwr cymwys arnoch i osod rheolaethau newydd ar eich system wresogi.

data.name: You have a central heating system with radiators and you do not already have a full set of controls.
data.value: Os oes gennych chi system gwres canolog gyda rheiddiaduron ac nid oes gennych set lawn o reolaethau yn barod.

data.name: Fit new windows
data.value: Gosod ffenestri newydd

data.name: Based on the information we have collected; it looks like you have some single glazed windows in your home. Double or triple glazed windows are much better at keeping the heat in, so would help you keep warm while reducing your heating bills.
data.value: Ar sail yr wybodaeth rydym wedi'i chasglu; mae'n ymddangos bod gennych rywfaint o ffenestri gwydr sengl yn eich cartref. Mae ffenestri gwydr dwbl neu driphlyg yn llawer gwell am gadw'r gwres i mewn, ac felly yn eich helpu i gadw'n gynnes yn ogystal â lleihau eich biliau gwresogi.

data.name: The fuel bill savings from replacing windows are unlikely to pay back the full installation cost, but there are other benefits such as reduced maintenance and better sound proofing that may affect your decision.
data.value: Mae’n annhebygol y bydd yr arbedion mewn biliau tanwydd a welir wrth newid ffenestri yn ad-dalu’r gost gosod lawn, ond mae manteision eraill fel llai o waith cynnal a chadw a gwrthsain gwell a allai effeithio ar eich penderfyniad.

data.name: If you live in a conservation area or listed building there may be limits on what changes you can make to your windows. You should check with your local authority to see what is allowed.
data.value: Os ydych chi'n byw mewn ardal gadwraeth neu adeilad rhestredig, efallai y bydd cyfyngiadau ar y newidiadau y gallwch chi eu gwneud i'ch ffenestri. Dylech chi holi eich awdurdod lleol i weld beth maen nhw’n ei ganiatáu.

data.name: You have any single glazed windows.
data.value: Oes gennych chi unrhyw ffenestri gwydr sengl.

data.name: Insulate your cavity walls
data.value: Inswleiddio eich waliau ceudod

data.name: From the information we have it looks like the outside walls of your home are cavity walls, and that the cavity has not been insulated.
data.value: O’r wybodaeth sydd gennym, mae’n ymddangos bod waliau allanol eich cartref yn waliau ceudod, ac nad ydynt wedi’u hinswleiddio.

data.name: Specialist contractors can inject insulation into the cavity, reducing heat loss significantly and helping to cut your bills.
data.value: Gall contractwyr arbenigol chwistrellu deunydd inswleiddio i mewn i’r ceudod, gan leihau faint o wres sy’n cael ei golli’n sylweddol a’ch helpu i leihau eich biliau.

data.name: Your property was built with uninsulated cavity walls - this was common between the 1920s and the 1980s.
data.value: Os adeiladwyd eich eiddo gyda waliau ceudod heb eu hinswleiddio - roedd hyn yn gyffredin rhwng yr 1920au a’r 1980au.

data.name: The cavity has not been insulated since.
data.value: Os nad yw’r ceudod wedi’i inswleiddio ers hynny.

data.name: Not all buildings are suitable for standard cavity wall insulation. You will need a specialist contractor to inspect your property to work out what insulation options you have.
data.value: Nid yw pob adeilad yn addas ar gyfer deunydd inswleiddio waliau ceudod safonol. Bydd angen contractwr arbenigol arnoch i archwilio eich eiddo i weld pa opsiynau inswleiddio sy’n agored i chi.

data.name: £OverLifetimeOfInstallationString
data.value: £{0} dros oes y gosodiad

data.name: Insulate your solid walls
data.value: Inswleiddio eich waliau solet

data.name: Solid wall insulation can be fitted internally (internal wall insulation) or externally (external wall insulation).
data.value: Mae modd gosod deunydd inswleiddio waliau solet yn fewnol (inswleiddio waliau mewnol) neu’n allanol (inswleiddio waliau allanol).

data.name: Internal wall insulation will slightly reduce the size of any rooms that have an external wall, and you will need to redecorate afterwards.
data.value: Bydd inswleiddio waliau mewnol yn lleihau ychydig ar faint unrhyw ystafelloedd sydd â wal allanol, a bydd angen i chi ailaddurno wedyn.

data.name: You can find more information on solid wall insulation on the Energy Saving Trust website.(opens in a new window)
data.value: Gallwch ddod o hyd i ragor o wybodaeth am ddeunydd inswleiddio waliau solet ar wefan yr Ymddiriedolaeth Arbed Ynni.(yn agor mewn ffenestr newydd)

data.name: You have solid brick or stone walls with no cavity (this is common for homes built before 1920).
data.value: Os oes gennych waliau solet o frics neu gerrig heb geudod (mae hyn yn gyffredin mewn cartrefi a adeiladwyd cyn 1920).

data.name: Your home is a non-standard construction such as steel frame, timber frame or concrete.
data.value: Adeiladwaith ansafonol fel ffrâm ddur, ffrâm bren neu goncrid sydd yn eich cartref.

data.name: You will need a specialist contractor to assess what the best way is to insulate your walls, and to carry out the work. This is not a DIY job, or one for a general builder.
data.value: Bydd angen contractwr arbenigol arnoch i asesu’r ffordd orau o inswleiddio eich waliau, ac i ymgymryd â’r gwaith. Dydy hon ddim yn dasg DIY nac yn dasg i adeiladwr cyffredinol.

data.name: Install a heat pump
data.value: Gosod pwmp gwres

data.name: A heat pump is a low carbon heating system and is much more efficient than a boiler. Rather than burning a fuel like gas or oil, it uses electricity to transfer heat from outside to heat your rooms and hot water.
data.value: Mae pwmp gwres yn system wresogi carbon isel ac mae’n llawer mwy effeithlon na boeler. Yn hytrach na llosgi tanwydd fel nwy neu olew, mae’n defnyddio trydan i drosglwyddo gwres o’r tu allan i wresogi eich ystafelloedd a’ch dŵr poeth.

data.name: You have some outdoor space
data.value: Os oes gennych chi rywfaint o le y tu allan

data.name: You are looking to reduce your carbon footprint
data.value: Os ydych chi eisiau lleihau eich ôl troed carbon

data.name: The running costs of heat pumps depend on a number of factors to do with your heating system and your property. Speak to a heat pump installer to find out more.
data.value: Mae costau rhedeg pympiau gwres yn dibynnu ar nifer o ffactorau sy’n ymwneud â’ch system wresogi a’ch eiddo. Siaradwch â gosodwr pympiau gwres i gael gwybod mwy.

data.name: PriceRangeForAnAirSourceHeatPumpString
data.value: £{0} - £{1} ar gyfer pwmp gwres ffynhonnell aer

data.name: PriceRangeForAGroundSourceHeatPumpString
data.value: £{0} - £{1} ar gyfer pwmp gwres o’r ddaear

data.name: Fit solar electric panels
data.value: Gosod paneli trydan solar

data.name: If you have a suitable roof area you may be able to fit solar photovoltaic panels, or solar PV, to generate electricity.
data.value: Os oes gennych chi le addas ar eich to, efallai y byddwch yn gallu gosod paneli ffotofoltäig solar, neu solar PV, i gynhyrchu trydan.

data.name: You have a roof area that faces somewhere south of due east or due west.
data.value: Os ydy rhan o’ch to yn wynebu rhywle i’r de o gyfeiriad y dwyrain neu’r gorllewin.

data.name: This roof area is not often shaded by trees or other buildings.
data.value: Os nad yw’r rhan hon o’r to yn cael ei chysgodi'n aml gan goed neu adeiladau eraill.

data.name: The savings you get from a solar PV system will depend on many factors, including whether there are people at home during the day using electricity.
data.value: Bydd yr arbedion a gewch o system solar PV yn dibynnu ar nifer o ffactorau, gan gynnwys a oes pobl gartref yn ystod y dydd yn defnyddio trydan.

data.name: How long could this take to install? 2 DAYS
data.value: Pa mor hir allai ei gymryd i’w osod? 2 DDIWRNOD

data.name: Insulate the ground floor
data.value: Inswleiddio’r llawr gwaelod

data.name: From the information we have it looks like you have a suspended timber floor. This means your ground floor is made of wooden floorboards with a gap underneath.
data.value: O’r wybodaeth sydd gennym mae’n ymddangos bod gennych lawr pren crog. Mae hyn yn golygu bod eich llawr gwaelod wedi’i wneud o estyll pren gyda bwlch oddi tanodd.

data.name: Your floor could be insulated by lifting the floorboards, fitting insulation between the joists and then putting the floorboards back. This is normally a job for a professional installer.
data.value: Gallai eich llawr gael ei inswleiddio drwy godi’r estyll, gosod deunydd inswleiddio rhwng y distiau ac yna rhoi’r estyll yn ôl. Tasg i osodwr proffesiynol ydy hon fel arfer.

data.name: You will need to completely empty the rooms that are being insulated, and remove any carpet or other floor covering, before the floor boards can be lifted.
data.value: Bydd angen i chi wagio’r ystafelloedd sy’n cael eu hinswleiddio’n gyfan gwbl a thynnu unrhyw garped neu orchudd arall sydd ar y llawr cyn y gellir codi’r estyll.

data.name: Your property has a suspended timber floor that has not yet been insulated. If you are unsure, a qualified installer will be able to confirm this for you.
data.value: Os oes gan eich eiddo lawr pren crog sydd heb ei inswleiddio hyd yma. Os ydych chi’n ansicr, bydd gosodwr cymwys yn gallu cadarnhau hyn i chi.

data.name: MoreInfoOnFloorInsulationOnEnergySavingTrustWebsiteString
data.value: Gallwch ddod o hyd i ragor o wybodaeth am ddeunydd inswleiddio lloriau ar wefan yr Ymddiriedolaeth Arbed Ynni.(yn agor mewn ffenestr newydd)

data.name: CautionYou will need to completely empty the rooms that are being insulated, and remove any carpet or other floor covering, before the floor boards can be lifted.
data.value: Rhybudd Bydd angen i chi wagio’r ystafelloedd sy’n cael eu hinswleiddio’n gyfan gwbl a thynnu unrhyw garped neu orchudd arall sydd ar y llawr cyn y gellir codi’r estyll.

data.name: FloorInsulationTypicallyLastsString
data.value: Disgwylir i ddeunydd inswleiddio lloriau bara tua 42 mlynedd fel arfer

data.name: Upgrade to high heat retention storage heaters
data.value: Uwchraddio i wresogyddion stôr sy’n cadw gwres uchel

data.name: Based on the information we have collected; it looks like you have manual storage heaters. Consider upgrading to high heat retention storage heaters with automatic controls.
data.value: Ar sail yr wybodaeth rydym wedi'i chasglu; mae'n ymddangos bod gennych wresogyddion stôr rydych chi’n eu rheoli eich hun. Ystyriwch uwchraddio i wresogyddion stôr cadw gwres uchel gyda rheolaethau awtomatig.

data.name: Compared to older storage heaters, modern high heat retention storage heaters:
data.value: O'i gymharu â hen wresogyddion stôr, mae gwresogyddion stôr cadw gwres uchel:

data.name: Hold more heat
data.value: Yn dal mwy o wres

data.name: Have better insulation
data.value: Wedi’u hinswleiddio’n well

data.name: Release heat more quickly when needed
data.value: Yn rhyddhau gwres yn fwy cyflym pan fo angen

data.name: Their improved controls, including automatic charge control, thermostat and programmer, allowing you to set the temperature you want the room to be heated and when, with the heater only drawing the electricity needed to meet that programme.
data.value: Yn cynnwys rheolaethau gwell, gan gynnwys rheolydd gwefru, thermostat a rhaglennydd awtomatig, sy’n eich galluogi i osod i ba dymheredd rydych am wresogi’r ystafell a phryd, gyda’r gwresogydd ond yn defnyddio’r trydan sydd ei angen i gyflawni’r rhaglen honno.

data.name: You have older, manually controlled storage heaters
data.value: Os oes gennych wresogyddion storio hŷn rydych chi’n eu rheoli eich hun

data.name: If you feel comfortable fitting this yourself, you can buy a British Standard jacket from most DIY shops and fit it snugly around the tank. These jackets will have heavy duty fixings and a flame retardant cover.
data.value: Os ydych chi’n teimlo’n gyfforddus yn gwneud hyn eich hun, gallwch brynu siaced Safon Brydeinig o’r rhan fwyaf o siopau DIY a’i rhoi’n daclus o amgylch y tanc. Bydd gan y siacedi hyn osodiadau cryf a gorchudd gwrth-fflam.

data.name: You may also want to consider using foam collars around any exposed hot water pipes to save even more energy.
data.value: Efallai y byddwch hefyd yn dymuno ystyried defnyddio coleri ewyn o amgylch unrhyw bibellau dŵr poeth agored i arbed mwy fyth o ynni.

data.name: Recommendation Suitable For
data.value: Argymhelliad yn addas ar gyfer

data.name: You have a hot water cylinder that isn’t factory insulated or has less than 80 mm thick insulating jacket
data.value: Mae gennych danc dŵr poeth sydd heb ei inswleiddio yn y ffatri neu sydd â siaced inswleiddio sy’n llai na 80mm o drwch

data.name: Recommendation Lifetime
data.value: Oes a Argymhellir

data.name: You may well need to fit new or additional controls when you fit a new gas boiler to comply with building regulations. These will help to maximise the system’s efficiency, saving you even more money.
data.value: Efallai y bydd angen i chi osod rheolaethau newydd neu ychwanegol pan fyddwch yn gosod boeler nwy newydd i gydymffurfio â'r rheoliadau adeiladu. Bydd y rhain yn helpu i wneud y system mor effeithlon â phosibl, gan arbed hyd yn oed mwy o arian i chi.

data.name: You have an old or inefficient gas boiler, or your boiler is broken
data.value: Mae gennych hen foeler nwy neu foeler nwy aneffeithlon, neu mae eich boeler wedi torri

data.name: Alternatively, you may want to consider fitting a low carbon heating system such as a heat pump.
data.value: Neu, efallai y byddwch yn dymuno ystyried gosod system wresogi carbon isel fel pwmp gwres.

data.name: Gas boiler installations, and any work on a gas heating system, can only be carried out by an installer on the Gas Safe Register.
data.value: Dim ond gosodwr ar y Gofrestr Diogelwch Nwy all osod boeleri nwy ac ymgymryd ag unrhyw waith ar system wresogi nwy.

data.name: Based on the information we have collected; it looks like you have some single glazed windows in your home. Double or triple glazed windows are much better at keeping the heat in, so would help
data.value: Ar sail yr wybodaeth rydym wedi'i chasglu; mae'n ymddangos bod gennych rywfaint o ffenestri gwydr sengl yn eich cartref. Mae ffenestri gwydr dwbl neu driphlyg yn llawer gwell am gadw'r gwres i mewn, ac felly yn eich helpu

data.name: you keep warm while reducing your heating bills.
data.value: i gadw'n gynnes yn ogystal â lleihau eich biliau gwresogi.

data.name: Caution
data.value: Rhybudd

data.name: Download your Action Plan
data.value: Llwytho eich Cynllun Gweithredu i lawr

data.name: YourActionPlanTitleString
data.value: Eich Cynllun Gweithredu

data.name: You could save up to
data.value: Gallech arbed hyd at

data.name: £AYearString
data.value: £{0} y flwyddyn

data.name: The total cost of the improvements could be
data.value: Gallai cyfanswm cost y gwelliannau fod yn

data.name: How did we calculate these figures?
data.value: Sut gwnaethom ni gyfrifo’r ffigurau hyn?

data.name: Recommendation
data.value: Argymhelliad

data.name: Heat pumps use the energy outside to heat your home and hot water
data.value: Mae pympiau gwres yn defnyddio’r ynni y tu allan i wresogi eich cartref a’ch dŵr poeth

data.name: Revisit recommendation
data.value: Ailedrych ar yr argymhelliad

data.name: Next we have steps to help you action these recommendations.
data.value: Nesaf, mae gennym gamau i’ch helpu i roi’r argymhellion hyn ar waith.

data.name: 1. Find out if you can apply for support
data.value: 1. Darganfod os gallech chi wneud cais am gymorth

data.name: There may be schemes or grants available to help with the cost of installing energy efficiency improvements.
data.value: Efallai y bydd cynlluniau neu grantiau ar gael i helpu â chost ymgymryd â gwelliannau effeithlonrwydd ynni.

data.name: We suggest speaking with your energy supplier, local council and chosen installer to ask if you may be eligible for any help.
data.value: Rydym yn awgrymu eich bod yn siarad â’ch cyflenwr ynni, eich cyngor lleol a’r gosodwr rydych chi wedi’i ddewis i ofyn a allech chi fod yn gymwys am unrhyw gymorth.

data.name: Some of the types of support include:
data.value: Dyma rai mathau o gymorth sydd ar gael:

data.name: Energy Company Obligation (ECO)
data.value: Rhwymedigaeth Cwmni Ynni (ECO)

data.name: Sustainable Warmth (Local Authority Delivery Phase 3 and Homes Upgrade Grant Phase 1)
data.value: Cynhesrwydd Cynaliadwy (Cyfnod Cyflawni 3 Awdurdod Lleol a Chyfnod Grant 1 Uwchraddio Cartrefi)

data.name: Boiler Upgrade Scheme
data.value: Cynllun Uwchraddio Boeleri

data.name: 2. Consult with a qualified installer
data.value: 2. Ymgynghori â gosodwr cymwys

data.name: We recommend consulting with a qualified installer to confirm what changes you can make to your property.
data.value: Rydym yn argymell eich bod yn ymgynghori â gosodwr cymwys i gadarnhau pa newidiadau y gallwch chi eu gwneud i’ch eiddo.

data.name: Research improvements you are unsure about
data.value: Ymchwiliwch i’r gwelliannau rydych chi’n ansicr yn eu cylch

data.name: You told us you would like some more information on one or more of the recommendations before considering them for your property:
data.value: Rydych chi wedi dweud wrthym y byddech chi’n hoffi cael rhagor o wybodaeth am un neu fwy o’r argymhellion cyn eu hystyried ar gyfer eich eiddo:

data.name: Recommendations you discarded
data.value: Argymhellion rydych chi wedi’u diystyru

data.name: Other ways to save energy
data.value: Ffyrdd eraill o arbed ynni

data.name: WhenBuyingNewAppliancesUpgradeEnergyLabelsString
data.value: Pan fyddwch chi’n prynu offer newydd, beth am uwchraddio i un sy'n defnyddio ynni'n effeithlon - Rhagor o wybodaeth am labeli ynni

data.name: InstallHeatPumpCheckIfHomeSuitableString
data.value: Gosod pwmp gwres - Edrychwch a ydy eich cartref yn addas

data.name: Returning to your Action Plan
data.value: Mynd yn ôl at eich Cynllun Gweithredu

data.name: GMWND25C

data.name: Accessibility Statement
data.value: Datganiad hygyrchedd

data.name: This statement applies to content published on our service.
data.value: Mae’r datganiad hwn yn berthnasol i gynnwys a gyhoeddir ar ein gwasanaeth.

data.name: This website is run by the Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy (BEIS). We want as many people as possible to be able to use this website. For example, that means you should be able to:
data.value: Mae’r wefan hon yn cael ei rhedeg gan yr Adran Busnes, Ynni a Strategaeth Ddiwydiannol (BEIS). Rydyn ni eisiau i gymaint o bobl ag sy’n bosib allu defnyddio'r wefan hon. Er enghraifft, mae hynny’n golygu y dylech chi allu:

data.name: change colours, contrast levels and fonts
data.value: newid lliwiau, lefelau cyferbyniad a ffontiau

data.name: zoom in up to 200% without the text spilling off the screen
data.value: chwyddo i mewn hyd at 200% a bod y testun i gyd yn dal i ffitio ar y sgrin

data.name: navigate most of the website using just a keyboard
data.value: symud o gwmpas y rhan fwyaf o'r wefan gan ddefnyddio bysellfwrdd yn unig

data.name: navigate most of the website using speech recognition software
data.value: symud o gwmpas y rhan fwyaf o'r wefan gan ddefnyddio meddalwedd adnabod llais

data.name: listen to most of the website using a screen reader (including the most recent versions of JAWS, NVDA and VoiceOver)
data.value: gwrando ar y rhan fwyaf o'r wefan gan ddefnyddio darllenydd sgrin (gan gynnwys y fersiynau mwyaf diweddar o JAWS, NVDA a VoiceOver)

data.name: We’ve also made the website text as simple as possible to understand.
data.value: Rydyn ni hefyd wedi gwneud testun y wefan mor syml, ac mor hawdd i’w ddeall ag sy’n bosib.

data.name: Reporting accessibility problems with this website
data.value: Rhoi gwybod am broblemau hygyrchedd yn ymwneud â'r wefan hon

data.name: Enforcement procedure
data.value: Gweithdrefn gorfodi

data.name: Technical information about this website’s accessibility
data.value: Gwybodaeth dechnegol am hygyrchedd y wefan hon

data.name: The Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy (BEIS) is committed to making its website accessible, in accordance with the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018.
data.value: Mae’r Adran Busnes, Ynni a Strategaeth Ddiwydiannol (BEIS) wedi ymrwymo i wneud ei gwefan yn hygyrch, yn unol â Rheoliadau Hygyrchedd Cyrff Sector Cyhoeddus (Gwefannau ac Apiau Symudol) (Rhif 2) 2018.

data.name: Compliance status
data.value: Statws Cydymffurfio

data.name: Content that’s not within the scope of the accessibility regulations
data.value: Cynnwys nad yw o fewn cwmpas y rheoliadau hygyrchedd

data.name: Not applicable.
data.value: Ddim yn berthnasol.

data.name: What we’re doing to improve accessibility
data.value: Beth rydyn ni’n ei wneud i wella hygyrchedd

data.name: We will fix issues that fail to meet the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines version 2.1 AA standard. We will update this page when issues are fixed.
data.value: Byddwn yn datrys problemau nad ydynt yn cydymffurfio â safon AA Canllawiau Hygyrchedd Cynnwys y We fersiwn 2.1. Byddwn yn diweddaru’r dudalen hon pan fydd problemau wedi cael eu datrys.

data.name: Preparation of this accessibility statement
data.value: Paratoi’r datganiad hygyrchedd hwn

data.name: This statement was prepared on 16 June 2022. It was last reviewed on 16 June 2022.
data.value: Paratowyd y datganiad hwn ar 16 Mehefin 2022. Cafodd ei adolygu ddiwethaf ar 16 Mehefin 2022.

data.name: This website was last tested on 16 June 2022. The test was carried out by a Digital Accessibility Expert.
data.value: Cafodd y wefan hon ei phrofi ddiwethaf ar 16 Mehefin 2022. Cynhaliwyd y prawf gan Arbenigwr Hygyrchedd Digidol.

data.name: Privacy notice
data.value: Hysbysiad preifatrwydd

data.name: This notice sets out how we will use your personal data, and your rights. It is made under Articles 13 and/or 14 of the UK General Data Protection Regulation (UK GDPR).
data.value: Mae’r rhybudd hwn yn nodi sut byddwn yn defnyddio eich data personol, a’ch hawliau. Fe’i gwneir o dan Erthygl 13 a/neu 14 o Reoliad Cyffredinol y DU ar Ddiogelu Data (GDPR).

data.name: Your data
data.value: Eich data

data.name: This service does not automatically collect or store any personal data about you.
data.value: Nid yw’r gwasanaeth hwn yn casglu nac yn storio data personol amdanoch chi yn awtomatig.

data.name: We may process the following personal data:
data.value: Efallai y byddwn yn prosesu’r data personol canlynol:

data.name: Your name, email address and any other information sent directly to us via our email feedback function.
data.value: Eich enw, cyfeiriad e-bost ac unrhyw wybodaeth arall a anfonir yn uniongyrchol atom drwy ein swyddogaeth adborth e-bost.

data.name: Purpose
data.value: Pwrpas

data.name: We are processing your personal data in order to receive feedback about this service and to contact you for clarifications or to report service updates.
data.value: Rydym yn prosesu eich data personol er mwyn cael adborth am y gwasanaeth hwn ac i gysylltu â chi am eglurhad neu i roi gwybod am ddiweddariadau i’r gwasanaeth.

data.name: Legal basis of processing
data.value: Sail gyfreithiol dros brosesu

data.name: Recipients
data.value: Derbynwyr

data.name: Your personal data will be shared by us with other Government Departments or public authorities where necessary. We may share your data if we are required to do so by law, for example by court order or to prevent fraud or other crime.
data.value: Byddwn yn rhannu eich data personol gydag Adrannau eraill y Llywodraeth neu awdurdodau cyhoeddus lle bo angen. Efallai y byddwn yn rhannu eich data os bydd yn ofynnol i ni wneud hynny yn ôl y gyfraith, er enghraifft drwy orchymyn llys neu i atal twyll neu drosedd arall.

data.name: SharedWithDataProcessorsString
data.value: Gan y bydd eich data personol yn cael ei storio ar ein seilwaith TG, bydd hefyd yn cael ei rannu â’n proseswyr data Microsoft, GOV.UK PaaS, a GOV.UK Notify.

data.name: Your personal data may also be shared with the Softwire Technology Ltd who developed and help to maintain this service.
data.value: Efallai y bydd eich data personol hefyd yn cael ei rannu â Softwire Technology Ltd a ddatblygodd y gwasanaeth hwn ac sy’n helpu i’w gynnal.

data.name: Retention
data.value: Cadw data

data.name: Your personal details will be kept for a period of up to six months following the date of your final email sharing the details with us.
data.value: Bydd eich manylion personol yn cael eu cadw gennym am hyd at chwe mis ar ôl dyddiad eich e-bost olaf yn rhannu’r manylion â ni.

data.name: Automated decision making
data.value: Gwneud penderfyniadau awtomatig

data.name: Your personal data will not be subject to automated decision making.
data.value: Ni fydd eich data personol yn destun penderfyniadau awtomatig.

data.name: Your Rights
data.value: Eich Hawliau

data.name: You have the right to request information about how your personal data are processed, and to request a copy of that personal data.
data.value: Mae gennych hawl i ofyn am wybodaeth ynghylch sut mae eich data personol yn cael ei brosesu, a gofyn am gopi o’r data personol hwnnw.

data.name: You have the right to request that any inaccuracies in your personal data are rectified without delay.
data.value: Mae gennych hawl i ofyn i ni gywiro unrhyw wallau yn eich data personol yn ddi-oed.

data.name: You have the right to request that any incomplete personal data are completed, including by means of a supplementary statement.
data.value: Mae gennych hawl i ofyn i ni gwblhau unrhyw ddata personol anghyflawn, gan gynnwys drwy ddatganiad atodol.

data.name: You have the right to request that your personal data are erased if there is no longer a justification for them to be processed.
data.value: Mae gennych hawl i ofyn i’ch data personol gael eu dileu lle nad oes cyfiawnhad iddynt gael eu prosesu mwyach.

data.name: You have the right in certain circumstances (for example, where accuracy is contested) to request that the processing of your personal data is restricted.
data.value: Mae gennych hawl mewn rhai amgylchiadau (er enghraifft, pan fydd amheuaeth ynghylch cywirdeb) i ofyn am gyfyngu ar brosesu eich data personol.

data.name: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data where it is processed for direct marketing purposes.
data.value: Mae gennych hawl i wrthwynebu i ni brosesu eich data personol lle bydd yn cael ei brosesu at ddibenion marchnata uniongyrchol.

data.name: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data.
data.value: Mae gennych hawl i wrthwynebu i ni brosesu eich data personol.

data.name: International Transfers
data.value: Trosglwyddiadau Rhyngwladol

data.name: Based on the information we have collected; it looks like you have no insulation in your loft. We recommend that you have your loft insulated, if possible, up to the recommended thickness of 300mm, or 12 inches.
data.value: Ar sail yr wybodaeth rydyn ni wedi'i chasglu, mae'n edrych yn debyg nad oes gennych chi unrhyw inswleiddiad yn eich atig. Rydym yn argymell y dylech chi inswleiddio'ch atig, os oes modd, hyd at y trwch a argymhellir, sef 300mm, neu 12 modfedd.

data.name: Adding insulation will help trap the heat inside your property so your heating doesn’t need to be on as much, and so could make a significant saving on your fuel bills.
data.value: Bydd ychwanegu insiwleiddiad yn helpu i ddal y gwres y tu mewn i'ch eiddo fel nad oes angen i'ch gwres fod ymlaen gymaint, ac felly fe allai wneud arbediad sylweddol ar eich biliau tanwydd.

data.name: If some of your loft is boarded so that you can store things up there you will either need to raise this boarding up and insulate underneath it, or leave that part of the loft without insulation.
data.value: Os oes rhywfaint o'ch atig wedi'i fyrddio er mwyn ichi storio pethau yno, bydd angen ichi naill ai godi'r byrddau hyn ac inswleiddio odanyn nhw, neu adael y rhan yma o'r atig heb ei hinswleiddio.

data.name: If your loft is insulated, but you have less than the recommended amount (300mm or 12 inches thick) then it could still be worthwhile topping up your insulation
data.value: Os yw'ch atig wedi'i inswleiddio, ond bod gennych chi lai na'r swm a argymhellir (300mm neu 12 modfedd o drwch) yna fe allai fod yn werth codi lefel eich inswleiddiad o hyd.

data.name: If you have a basement or cellar beneath your house that you can get into safely, you could look down there to see what type of floor you have. If the floor is a suspended wooden floor, you should be able to see wooden joists and the undersides of the floorboards.
data.value: Os oes gennych chi seler o dan eich tŷ y gallwch fynd iddo'n ddiogel, fe allech chi edrych yno i weld pa fath o lawr sydd gennych. Os yw'r llawr yn llawr pren crog, fe ddylech chi allu gweld distiau pren ac ochrau isaf y byrddau.

data.name: A suspended timber floor can be insulated by lifting the floorboards and laying mineral wool insulation supported by netting between the joists, or cutting rigid insulation boards to size. It is possible done from below if there’s enough access to the cellar or crawl space.
data.value: Mae modd inswleiddio llawr pren crog drwy godi’r estyll a gosod deunydd inswleiddio gwlân mwynol oddi tanodd gan ei ddal yn ei le gyda rhwydi rhwng y distiau, neu drwy dorri byrddau inswleiddio anhyblyg i ffitio. Mae’n bosibl gwneud hyn oddi tanodd os oes digon o le i fynd i’r seler neu’r gofod cropian.

data.name: Based on the information we have collected; it looks like you could save money by adding an insulating jacket to your hot water cylinder. By insulating your hot water cylinder, you will retain more heat. It will mean your hot water stays hotter for longer, and you spend less money heating water up.
data.value: Ar sail yr wybodaeth rydym wedi'i chasglu; mae'n ymddangos y gallech chi arbed arian drwy roi siaced inswleiddio ar eich tanc dŵr poeth. Drwy inswleiddio eich tanc dŵr poeth, byddwch yn dal gafael ar fwy o wres. Mae’n golygu y bydd eich dŵr poeth yn aros yn boethach am hirach, ac y byddwch yn gwario llai o arian yn cynhesu dŵr.

data.name: If you are reasonably confident with DIY, this could be a task you can complete yourself. If not, this is a job for a handyperson.
data.value: Os ydych chi’n weddol hyderus gyda DIY, gallai hon fod yn dasg y gallwch ei chwblhau eich hun. Os na, mae hon yn dasg i grefftwr.

data.name: Based on the information we have collected, it looks like you have an old gas boiler that may not be operating efficiently. You could consider replacing this with a modern condensing boiler, which will use less gas to provide the same amount of heat, helping to cut your fuel bills and carbon dioxide emissions.

Gallech ystyried ei newid am foeler cyddwyso modern, a fydd yn defnyddio llai o nwy i ddarparu’r un faint o wres, gan helpu i leihau eich biliau tanwydd a’ch allyriadau carbon deuocsid.

data.name: External wall insulation is less disruptive to the inside of your home, but will change the external appearance of your home, so you will usually need planning permission. It’s unlikely to be allowed on the front of your property if you live in a conservation area.
